main event: Eight spherical objects, red and green in color, were observed in a scattered formation over Fitchburg, Massachusetts on 16 August 1956.
interesting points: The objects were observed for about eight minutes before fading from sight., The sighting involved a total of eight objects moving from the west behind clouds., Other keen objects were noted racing in an erratic pattern., One object was noted to be about the size of a parent disappearing span., The sighting is considered to have observations related to air refueling operations.
sighted object: eight spherical objects, red and green in color
